import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Exhibitorevent() { const [events, setEvents] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Fetch events data from your backend API axios.get("http://localhost:4000/viewevent") .then(response => { // Filter events that have been accepted by the admin const acceptedEvents = response.data.filter(event => event.status === 'Request Accepted'); setEvents(acceptedEvents); }) .catch(error => console.log(error)); }, []); return (
  • My Profile
  • Add Events
  • Request For Events
  • MyEvents
  • Tickets Status
  • Communicate With Admin

{events.map(event => (
{event.title}

Speaker: {event.speaker}

Date: {event.date}

Time: {event.time}

Venue: {event.venue}

Ticket: {event.ticket}

Description: {event.description}

))}
{/* Work end */}
); } export default Exhibitorevent;
